entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
